Heather, in our 7 years of hosting this event this is the first time someone has brought this issue to the table. We thank you for doing so. Please know we would be more than happy to explore the opportunity of having this event on the weekend should the community prefer. We certainly don't like to hear that anyone feels left out, so rest assured we will be work with housing, tenant units and event guests to poll event date preferences.  Many units from around the area have made Community Day their Organization Day and we welcome these units, their families, and children. If you have any further questions, please feel free to call 718-630-4040. Thank you!
